Victor KhooLevel 2. RookieUpdated on 07 Jun 2019I have been a property agent for 22 years, since age 40, no matter how the market go up or down, there are always people who need to buy, sell or rent. If you can serve people with sincerity, many will look to you for help.www.victorkhoo.sg1 comment1
